main_text:
Experience and Metaphysics || Metaphysics
3.4 Metaphysics

Much which is central to Dewey’s metaphysics has been
discussed—the transactional organism-environment setting, mind,
consciousness, and experience. Accordingly, this section will focus on
the development of Dewey’s conception of
“metaphysics”, the main project in Experience and
Nature, how a so-called empirical metaphysics intended to
reconnect with the ancient idea of philosophy as wisdom, and finally
it will sketch some of the criticisms Dewey’s metaphysics
received.
hierarchy_title: John Dewey || Experience and Metaphysics || Metaphysics
